tasks.label: kill-port-3000
args: $pid = (Get-NetTCPConnection -LocalPort 3000 -State Listen -ErrorAction SilentlyContinue | Select-Object -First 1 -ExpandProperty OwningProcess); if ($pid) { Stop-Process -Id $pid -Force; Write-Output "Stopped PID $pid on port 3000" } else { Write-Output "No listener on port 3000" }

tasks.label: kill-port-3000
args: $procId = (Get-NetTCPConnection -LocalPort 3000 -State Listen -ErrorAction SilentlyContinue | Select-Object -First 1 -ExpandProperty OwningProcess); if ($procId) { Stop-Process -Id $procId -Force; Write-Output "Stopped PID $procId on port 3000" } else { Write-Output "No listener on port 3000" }

tasks.label: kill-port-3000-v2
args: for /f "tokens=5" %a in ('netstat -aon ^| findstr :3000 ^| findstr LISTENING') do taskkill /PID %a /F
